name: equiprobable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
equally probable, or equally likely to happen: Each of these actions has several possible results, all of which are equiprobable. There are two equiprobable possibilities here. Related word
probable
More examplesFewer examplesRandomization aims to make it equiprobable that any individual will be chosen for the trial.If all the events are equiprobable, uncertainty about which of them will happen next is high.When you roll a dice, each of the six possible positions is equiprobable.We have only discussed the experiments whose outcomes are equiprobable.
